backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a multi-game-mode ICP trading game with account management, buy/sell operations, leaderboards, winners tracking, and role-based access control using authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: displaying ICP holdings in sell section, MAX button for selling all ICP, and MAX button for buying with available cash.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components for trading, portfolio, leaderboard, game mode selection, timers, and custom hooks for data fetching and state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark themes for a trading interface with emerald/teal accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the ICP Trading Game React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing authentication flow, game mode context, and tabbed navigation between trade, portfolio, and leaderboard views with auto-account creation.
frontend/src/components/GameModeSelector: Button group component for selecting between daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly game modes using the GameModeContext.
frontend/src/components/GameTimer.tsx: Countdown timer display showing days, hours, minutes, and seconds remaining until the next game mode reset.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Game-mode-specific leaderboard table displaying ranked traders with trophy icons, portfolio values, P&L metrics, and a WinnersSection for historical winners.
frontend/src/components/Portfolio.tsx: Displays user portfolio with cash balance, ICP holdings, total value, and profit/loss metrics. Includes admin-only reset account functionality with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/PriceChart.tsx: Renders an interactive ICP price chart using Recharts with multiple timeframe options (24H to 180D), showing current price and percentage change with trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/TradingPanel.tsx: Provides buy/sell trading interface with dual input modes (ICP or dollar amounts), max buttons for quick trades, and real-time cost/proceeds calculations with validation.
frontend/src/components/WinnersSection.t: Displays a table of past winners for the selected game mode, showing winner profiles, final portfolio values, profit/loss percentages, and timestamps sorted by most recent.
frontend/src/contexts/GameModeContext.ts: React context provider for managing game mode state (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly) with localStorage persistence across sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, handling actor recreation on identity changes and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameTimer.ts: Calculates and updates countdown timer for game mode resets (daily/weekly/monthly/yearly), returning days, hours, minutes, and seconds remaining until next reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useICPPriceData.ts: Fetches ICP price data from CoinGecko API for various timeframes and provides current price query with automatic refetching intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and integration with @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: Fetches and processes leaderboard data by calculating total portfolio value and profit/loss for each player, sorted by performance.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolio.ts: Retrieves and calculates the current user's portfolio including cash balance, ICP holdings, and total value using identity and current ICP price.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching leaderboard data and checking admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradingActions.ts: Provides functions for buying/selling ICP and resetting accounts with loading states, error handling, and query cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWinners.ts: React Query hook that fetches the list of winners for a specific game mode from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage, supporting both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting an ICP trading simulator with multiple game modes (24h/7d/30d/1yr), real-time price charts, virtual $10,000 trading accounts, leaderboards, and admin controls. Known issues include buy transactions not deducting cash and inaccurate ICP purchase calculations.
